participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, she enjoys sports and staying active.
participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business.

participant_2.background: i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.
